check.name: RegexpHeader
check.description: Checks the header of a source file against a header that contains a pattern for each line of the source header.

property.default-value: the charset property of the parent Checker module
property.name: charset
property.description: Specify the character encoding to use when reading the headerFile.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify the file extensions of the files to process.

property.name: header
property.description:
Define the required header specified inline. Individual header lines must be separated by the string {@code "
"} (even on platforms with a different line separator). For header lines containing {@code "

"} checkstyle will forcefully expect an empty line to exist. See examples below. Regular expressions must not span multiple lines.

property.name: headerFile
property.description: Specify the name of the file containing the required header.

property.name: multiLines
property.description: Specify the line numbers to repeat (zero or more times).
